wikipedia_page.main: James Adey Ogle (1792–1857) was an English physician.

link_mentions.page: List of fellows of the Royal Society M, N, O

response: Raymond Crawfurd was born in East Grinstead on 9 November 1865, the youngest of the six sons of the Reverend Charles Walter Payne Crawfurd and Mary, daughter of James Adey Ogle, Regius professor of medicine at the University of Oxford. Four of his brothers also attended Oxford. In 1898, he married Ethelberta Ormrod, daughter of Colonel Arthur Bailey, J.P., of Bolton. They had three sons.
